documents.document: @UnquietDreams @Kitsgirl1 We use Patrick for the export market and keep Brigid for ourselves. That'll work, right?
@datbeardyman I really should sleep at some point. It's next month already! Goodnight!
@Kitsgirl1 Are we allowed two patron saints? Brigid and Patrick? @UnquietDreams
@datbeardyman I will of course. And I have to keep getting things done. One small step at a time!
@datbeardyman But for now, getting things done is a good start.
@datbeardyman I'm alive. I'm happy. I'm getting things done. I would be getting things done faster if the courts service was quicker (1/2)
@datbeardyman Hopefully! I'll put it on my to do list now.
@datbeardyman I'm still torn between whether the cover for this, or for Death and Duty is my favourite! Two years though... Wow.
@SarahO_Connell acceptance, but there will be support from sources you never thought of. It will be difficult, but it will be worth it (2/2)
@SarahO_Connell It's a very well put together piece, and so true. Be positive going into it, be confident, don't expect universal... (1/2)
@SarahO_Connell The first thing. I am still the same person. THIS. A MILLION TIMES THIS! And being trans* doesn't define you as a person.
@MarianMcCarthy @RebelLipstick In test 2 I... never did the reverse. Was about to when someone took the space. Examiner signed it off.
@RebelLipstick A nice examiner will put your mind at ease. Then you can concentrate solely on the task at hand.
@RebelLipstick My first was a pr*ck too. Failed. Asked where it went wrong. "I can't tell you". But how can I learn? "I can't tell you"
@RebelLipstick It helps if the examiner is really nice (my 2nd was), but take it easy, and do the basics really well (observation++)
@RebelLipstick Calmness helps. I was pulled up on progress (grade 2), but examiner said that I was making sure I didn't fuck up. (1/2)
@rickoshea I would have thought at this stage, anyone old enough to regularly use the word "dude" would be too old to rush anywhere.
@makeupmonster_ I agree completely with the good Captain! Congrats!
@Kitsgirl1 'Tis far from stained glass windows ye were reared! Oh, wait. It's Ireland. Ye were reared under one!
@Queen_UK I hope, Ma'am, that you stand ready to offer to move in, set up a Governor, and pretend Independence never happened.
@pixiephoeynicks @ClaireByReverie @wildechicblog It would just be me in a corner with a bottle of champagne not tweeting about it!
@pixiephoeynicks @ClaireByReverie @wildechicblog Exactly! But there wouldn't ab any actual awards, because it just creates problems.
@ClaireByReverie @wildechicblog We need awards for bloggers who don't do awards. You'd both win!
@lornajaneduffy There is just something special about Copenhagen. An amazing place to be!
@unakavanagh Probably the most random tweet I've seen today!
@EimearMcCormack I can think of worse ways to spend a weekend! Congrats!
@ClaireByReverie Signed. Though by March, the only people who can get visas will be white American males #ImNotReallyJoking
@RosemaryMacCabe If that is what being an "influencer" means, then frankly I'd tell people where to shove that title. Disgusting behaviour.
@ItsCherrySue I'm not allowed to discuss my contractual arrangements :-P
@ItsCherrySue You can't replace him, so... Have fun furniture shopping.
@Jim_Sheridan More and more Orwellian. As I see it, Trump is BB. American people are Eurasia, Eastasia & The Party, part bringing their doom
@GlamityJane1 Your point being? You don't need to have a cat for one to suddenly appear claiming rights over your couch.
@GlamityJane1 That's about right!
@SquidgeMundo @ChirpsLilRedHen Virgin have gotten a bit better since they started on the new separate modems. The one in the TV box... :-(
@lovelygirlybits Must you post these things when you know my bank balance can't cope with the cuteness! @TooFaced
Thanks to @lidl_ireland for letting us know a #Valentines outfit should be bra, knickers and hold-up's. I prefer clâ€¦ https://t.co/6O7smZy4fY
@blacknight Fair play for trying so hard to get things sorted. Guess it proves technology is great when working, but hell when it isn't!
@ClaireByReverie @totalmakeupadd There is that benefit of course!
@ClaireByReverie @totalmakeupadd Though the couple of quid to enter may be worth it for the few hours of hope it gives you!
@totalmakeupadd @ClaireByReverie You know what they say... If you're not in, you can't lose.
@thebeauttruth Sometimes it does! I agree completely.
@thebeauttruth Good choice! Enjoy the vino.
@patcourtenay Say Pat, while you're there retweeting me. Could you give it 30 mins and play Blondie - Maria for me? Will be in the car then.
@rickoshea @instagram @facebook That is very true. I hope someone can some up with an option that helps you!
@rickoshea @instagram being a Facebook brand, maybe you could try with them too? Might be able to point you in the right direction @facebook
@patcourtenay That's impressively cool. Without the pickups, it looks kinda like a Nordic concert hall.
@GeorgeTakei Could you make it sound any more Orwellian? It's scary enough as it is!
@Creativeyoke Hmmm very tempting! That's definitely not the worst that could happen! @RyanGosling
@redlips_redhair Was trying to remember if it was arm or shoulder, but yay for being able to do something!
@redlips_redhair Woohoo! Hope the arm feels good after!
@makeupmonster_ There's a Lemon gif for anything.
@fluffanella We just have to wait and see I guess!
@fluffanella Not in those exact words.
@fluffanella Would they say yes to a trans* person with more baggage than a package holiday flight?
I must be insane. I've just applied for a ticket to the Late Late Show... Valentine's Singles show. What's the worst that could happen?
@Kitsgirl1 Glad to hear it. Enjoy the nap!
@Kitsgirl1 Looks nice. Horse it into ya!
@CiamhieMc I love the sentiment, but my bank balance doesn't!
@PopsyDaisyCorn Beer... Caramel... Popcorn? Now you have me interested! @galwaybeer
@aaroadwatch @LiveDrive Something is backing up traffic on R118 Wyattville Rd heading to Cherrywood/M50.
@LiveDrive Excellent, thank you!
@LiveDrive Any issues on M50 this morning? About to do an airport run from Bray. Tried yesterday and got stuck in that traffic!
@cr15b Indeed! You could see the looks in other passengers eyes of "does someone say something, or do we all move"
@cr15b Busaras to Abbey St. @Luas
The joys of the @Luas Red Line. This afternoon: Woman brushing her teeth, while smoking a joint. Proceeds to spit on floor & throw t'brush ðŸ˜°
@whatkhdid Some things are allowed to be said over and over. I think this counts as one ;-)
@EffiMai Isn't it on your list of requirements for an appearance - lights turned down and mirrors covered? It's on mine!
@RosemaryMacCabe I see there is a lot of furore online, yet I don't want to see the article referred, lest my click is seen as support.
@redlips_redhair I'm only about here for a few minutes today running errands, but yes, coffee is required soon!
Lloyds Pharmacy Blackrock replace Christmas display with weight loss one, because guilt and New Years resolutions are great marketing tools!
1980's @hornby #trainset instructions were surprisingly #PoliticallyCorrect #ThomasAndFriends #FatControllerâ€¦ https://t.co/nMHp4NrRrq
@totalmakeupadd I think we have all done that last bit at one point or another!
@totalmakeupadd Wow! That's really bad!
@totalmakeupadd I will! They can look great when properly done, but they are a lot more hassle than people think!
@totalmakeupadd Oh dear. Neither option sounds pleasant. I can only offer hugs and sympathy.
@totalmakeupadd I'm wincing in pain just thinking about it!
When people feel the need to start commenting on tweets from 2 and a half years ago... And they deign to call me aâ€¦ https://t.co/YPIs6IuG6x
@CormacCor You win the internet! #raydarcyshow
Is it over? Have the singers gone home? #raydarcyshow
@RosesandRockets Exactly! And the licencepayers are footing the bill ðŸ˜¡
Can I have â‚¬10 in cash, Ray? #raydarcyshow
Possibly appearing on tonight's #raydarcyshow are my sister and brother in law. They were on the radio with him during the week.
@HappyBubbleGal Did he find the droid he was looking for?
@C_Musings The feeling is very much mutual x
@C_Musings Awww. That is really the nicest thing that has been said about me. You're a wonderful friend #WomenWhoInspireMe
Ah Ryan, making the poor kid think he had eaten his pet lamb. You're a feckin' monster #LateLateToyShow
@ParcelMotel I hope so, and that things are sorted out soon, or a second package will have to be declared missing.
Idea for @parcelmotel - Put, in BIG LETTERS on your website, what date you are processing parcels from. That, or start responding to people!
@scarie @InTheseHeels I've lost sound of the number of great people I've met via Twitter!
@InTheseHeels I'm surprised at the number of no votes. It's almost like some people don't realise there's people behind these words (mostly)
@ParcelMotel Ticket raised 166085
@ParcelMotel Can I get an answer please? Is the parcel in a queue to be checked in, or is it missing?
.@ParcelMotel Hi. If an item was delivered to Newtonabbey on Saturday (via Hermes) when should it be checked in? Not on account yet (802652)
The cat tried to seize control, and everyone panicked, until we realised she doesn't know how to work the remote.â€¦ https://t.co/Ru4OvAVinV
@mrsgrainnet I'm still surviving. Doing little bits and pieces as much as possible. Hope you're well?
Ah Rory, you'll have the stadium in tears #IRLvAUS
3 wins and one hell of a loss. Great month's work by Ireland! #IRLvAUS
Mumm yellow: Difficult call, but if you were to trust anyone to make it, it would be Nigel & Jerome. Great teamwork @Nigelrefowens #IRLvAUS
@EvaFeatures70 Alas that seems to be the case.
I'm sorry. I have to say this. To all making hideous comments about Rudd. It's none of your fucking business. Fuck off! #UniversityChallenge
